name: Diphtheria cases
descriptionShort: Reported diphtheria cases in the United States.
datasetName: Reported diphtheria cases in the United States

origins.title: Historical diphtheria cases in the United States - United States Census Bureau
origins.description:
Data on historical diphtheria cases in the United States, from the United States Census Bureau.

* 1938-1943: [Statistical Abstract of the United States: 1944-45 (Part 2 - Vital Statistics, Page 82)](https://www.census.gov/library/publications/1945/compendia/statab/66ed.html)
origins.citationFull: Statistical Abstract of the United States: 1944-45 (1945), United States Census Bureau.

origins.title: Historical diphtheria cases in the United States - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
origins.description:
Data on historical diphtheria cases in the United States, compiled from a selection of sources from the US CDC.

Sources for each year are as follows:

* 1937: Public Health Reports, Vol. 53, No. 44 - [Health Conditions in the United States as Indicated by Mortality Rates, 1929-38](https://stacks.cdc.gov/view/cdc/69651/cdc_69651_DS1.pdf)

* 1944-1993:[Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report Annual Supplement Summary 1993 Vol. 42, No. 53 by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), US Public Health Service](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/index93.html)

* 1994: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 1994](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/00039679.htm)

* 1995: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 1995](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/00044418.htm)

* 1996: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 1996](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/00050719.htm)

* 1997: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 1997](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/00056071.htm)

* 1998: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 1998](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm4753a1.htm)

* 1999: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 1999](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm4853a1.htm)

* 2000: [Historical Summaries of Notifiable Diseases in the United States, 1969–2000](https://www.jstor.org/stable/23310295)

* 2001-2006: [Historical Summaries of Notifiable Diseases in the United States, 1975–2006](https://www.jstor.org/stable/23317332)

* 2007: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 2007](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5653a1.htm)

* 2008: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 2008](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5754a1.htm)

* 2009: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 2009](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5853a1.htm)

* 2010: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 2010](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm5953a1.htm)

* 2011: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 2011](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm6053a1.htm)

* 2012: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 2012](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm6153a1.htm)

* 2013: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 2013](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/preview/mmwrhtml/mm6253a1.htm)

* 2014: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 2014](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/63/wr/mm6354a1.htm)

* 2015: [Summary of Notifiable Diseases, United States, 2015](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/64/wr/mm6453a1.htm)

* 2016-2022: [National Notifiable Diseases Surveillance System (NNDSS)](https://wonder.cdc.gov/nndss-annual-summary.html)
origins.producer: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
origins.citationFull:
Public Health Reports, Vol. 53, No. 44 - Health Conditions in the United States as Indicated by Mortality Rates, 1929-38. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), US Public Health Service.

Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report Annual Supplement Summary 1993 Vol. 42, No. 53 by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), US Public Health Service.

Summary of Notifiable Diseases - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), US Public Health Service, United States, 1994-2015

National Notifiable Diseases Surveillance System (NNDSS) - Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), (2016-2022)
